system.prerequisites: Psy 6, Corruption 40+, Infamy 40+, Child of the Warp, Hatred (Any)
system.sustained:
Power lasts for Psy Rating Rounds, if the Psyker reaches 0 Wounds it ends early and they are Stunned for one round. The Psyker gains Daemonic(Psy Rating/2), Fear(3), and Warp Instability, and can select two of the following packages of traits:
Daemonic Resistance - choose three of: Natural Armour(2), Regeneration(4), Sturdy, The Stuff of Nightmares, and Unnatural Toughness(3)
Bestial Form - choose three of: Amphibious, Amorphous, Dark Sight, Flyer(3), Multiple Arms(1), Quadruped, Toxic(2), and Unnatural Senses(5)
Predatory Gifts: Gain Deadly Natural Weapons, Unnatural Strength(3), and Warp Weapon Traits, choose one effect to add to natural weapons: Crippling(3), Felling(3), Flame, Flexible, Tearing, Toxic(2), or Tainted
